name: Mobs and Bombs
description:
I created this game using Unreal 5, C++, and freely available assets from various sources including the Unreal Marketplace and Mixamo. I consider this a "prototype" as it is something I created while learning how to implement several features for the first time following a course.

Features

  • Weapon pickups
  • Hazards
  • Moving platforms and door switches
  • Level switching
  • Procedural enemy spawning
  • Pickups (coins and health potions)
  • Jumping, sprinting, and stamina
  • Weapon trails and particles
  • HUD elements
  • Main Menu elements
  • Animations

Code: https://github.com/AmateurProjects/FirstProject

How to play:

  1. Download the .zip and extract it to desired location.
  2. Navigate to the PackagedFirstProject\Windows folder.
  3. Double-click FirstProject.exe.

You may be prompted to install some prerequisites such as UE4 and .NET when running the .exe if your PC doesn't already have them.
